This Release is Untouch Bahamut's Iso To Patch it -

1.Dowload the patch from here -- bit ly/e9cmPv --and extract it.

2.Run WQSG UMD and open the iso

3.Go to PSPGAME\SYSDIR

4.Now Drag N Drop all files from "MHP631" Folder To PSPGAME\SYSDIR

5.thats It Close WQSG UMD and Copy Iso to psp.

Tested & Working on 5.00 M33.
